title: Marathon the ultimate challenge
creator_credit: Alan Jacques, Patrick Ramsey and Marathon Film Productions
brief_description: An award winning film about the determination, the satisfaction and the exhilaration of running a marathon. This film takes the viewer into a marathon and gives insight into what a runner experiences. This is more than a sports film - it is a film about setting a goal, working towards it and achieving it.
